caption:
This photograph captures a serene scene by a waterfront. An elderly man rides his bicycle on a paved walkway alongside a guardrail, facing left-side of the frame. He is dressed casually in a blue short-sleeved shirt and dark pants, with glasses. His posture suggests a leisurely ride, taking in the scenery.

The background is also visually detailed. The water, calm and expansive, stretches across the midground and is bordered by a distant shoreline adorned with buildings and lush trees. On the right, there is a large marina filled with numerous boats docked in neat rows. The sky is clear and brightly lit, indicating a sunny day.

The overall composition of the image, with the cyclist and the waterfront, evokes a sense of peacefulness and leisure, typical of a beautiful, sunny day spent near the water. The structures and boats add depth and interest to the otherwise tranquil setting.
title: Retired resident, formerly a worker up north, pauses at the municipal boat docks
